channel.title: Main on Prog'z
channel.description: Recent content in Main on Prog'z

item.title: About Me
item.description: About me Me in a nutshell Main languages : - C++ - C# - C - Python - Java What I'm good at : - Rendering (OpenGL / Vulkan) (GLSL / HLSL) - Engine Tools & Architecture - Algorithms (leetcode / france ioi) - Making games (Unity / Unreal Engine 4/5) - GUI (+ optimizations) - Multithreading - Networking - Artificial Intelligence I can also do some other things, contact me if you're interested!

item.title: Projects
item.description: (Almost) all Projects Sikaria A multiplayer stealth game Play More GP Engine A custom Engine made from C++, with a game Play Code More Forest An introduction to Tech Art Play Code More Rasterizer Rendering pixels to the screen to make it look 3D Code More Hawkswell Engine & Tools Programmer Website Music Generation Framework A framework to generate music in videogames Code Shape Journey 2D metroidvania / platformer Play Code More Discord Wrapper For Godot A plugin to make discord bots easily on Godot Code Aphrodite's Rendering Engine Tutorials to make a Rendering Engine with Vulkan Code Playlist More Non Euclidean OpenGL Learning Modern OpenGL by doing non euclidean effects Code More Hyperseries A gamified streaming platform More Sandbox Assistant Teaching and evaluating students More RTS AI Development of the AI of a Real Time Strategy game Code Conference More 3D Animations Making 3D skeletal animations Code More Bim!
